content: is crocheted in the round the color used per round is menconed as a b or c at the beginning of each round color is changed aler each round only cut yarn when instructed each round is closed with a slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st st of the round the color for the next round is pulled through in this slip_stitch see the 1st photo below aler the slip_stitch is made pull the loop indicated in the 1st photo below cght aler the chain 1 of the next round it should look as indicated in the 2nd photo below leave the color of the previous round behind for easy pick up in the next round the chain 1 at the beginning of each round does not count as a st unless indicated otherwise the 1st st of each round is made in the next st aler the st in which the chain 1 was made in the last st of each round is made in the same st as the starcng chain 1 was made in when making the last single_crochet of a round single_crochet over the color that was lel behind to carry it up all single_crochet are made in bl only of the next st of the previous round all double_crochet are made in fl only of the next st of the previous round of the same color so 2 rounds below © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 3 the chart © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 4 how to read the chart read this chart from the right to the lel and from the bobble om to the top color a is the background color color b is the pa ern color the red line indicates the part to be crocheted for this bag the repeat is 20 st wide the color to be used in a round is indicated with the colored a or b square on the 1st verccal bar each round starts with a chain 1 which is not shown in the chart verccal bars 2 3 27 and 28 colored pink are not part of the pa ern a blank square is crocheted as a single_crochet in the bl only of the next st of the previous round a square with a cross in it is crocheted as a double_crochet in the fl only of the next st 2 rounds down a square with a climbing diagonal line to the right in it skip the next st double_crochet in the fl only of the next st 2 row down be aware the next double_crochet of the round is made in the same fl a square with a climbing diagonal line to the lel in it double_crochet in the fl of the same st and skip the next st before making the next st because each round is started in the next st aler the round is closed the first st of the next round will
